text: I, Robot is a 2004 American German science fiction action movie directed by Alex Proyas and starring Will Smith, Bruce Greenwood, Bridget Moynahan, Shia LaBeouf, James Cromwell, Fiona Hogan, Chi McBride. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 2005. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2004 action movies Category:2004 science fiction movies Category:American action movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:German action movies Category:German science fiction movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Alex Proyas Category:Robot movies Category:Movies set in the 2030s Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: I, Robot (movie)
